pageProps.title: Getting Started with Node.js and Socket.io
pageProps.metaDesc: Node.js and Socket.io are powerful technologies that enable real-time communication between a server and clients. Node.js is a runtime environment that allows running JavaScript code on the server-side, while Socket.io is a library that enables bidirectional, event-based communication between the server and the clients. In this article, we will explore the fundamentals of Node.js and Socket.io, and guide you through the process of getting started with building real-time applications.
